attributes.title: FIRST Night
attributes.caption: Kick-off RTX at Home 2021 with FIRST Night on July 8, 5:00 PM CT with emcee’s Geoff Ramsey and Gustavo Sorola. FIRST Night features Rooster Teeth original premieres, sneak peeks, and some of the year’s biggest news!
attributes.description: Kick-off RTX at Home 2021 with FIRST Night on July 8, 5:00 PM CT with emcee’s Geoff Ramsey and Gustavo Sorola. FIRST Night features Rooster Teeth original premieres, sneak peeks, and some of the year’s biggest news!

attributes.title: RWBY
attributes.caption: Join the cast and crew of RWBY for exclusive sneak peeks at Volume 9 and first looks at products from the expanding RWBY universe!
attributes.description: Join the cast and crew of RWBY for exclusive sneak peeks at Volume 9 and first looks at products from the expanding RWBY universe! Writers and directors Kerry Shawcross, Eddy Rivas, and Miles Luna are accompanied by Supervising Producer Laura Yates and lead voice actresses Lindsay Jones (Ruby Rose), Kara Eberle (Weiss Schnee), Arryn Zech (Blake Belladonna), and Barbara Dunkelman (Yang Xiao Long).

attributes.title: RT Rainbow Panel
attributes.caption: FIERCE: The courageous act of working in the media sphere as an out member of the LGBTQIA+ family.
attributes.description: FIERCE: The courageous act of working in the media sphere as an out member of the LGBTQIA+ family.

attributes.title: WEBTOON: Webcomic to Animation
attributes.caption: Join Rooster Teeth's 2D Production Team as they speak about working with WEBTOON and the challenges of bringing a webcomic to life, creative adaptations, the animation pipeline, and what it takes to tell a great story.
attributes.description: Join Rooster Teeth's 2D Production Team as they speak about working with WEBTOON and the challenges of bringing a webcomic to life, creative adaptations, the animation pipeline, and what it takes to tell a great story. Check out WEBTOON at http://bit.ly/3pk8Fh0 and www.webtoon.com.

attributes.title: Achievement Hunter
attributes.caption: Why are you even reading this description? It's the panel where Achievement Hunter hangs out in Stage 5 while answering your questions. You know exactly what you're getting.
attributes.description: Why are you even reading this description? It's the panel where Achievement Hunter hangs out in Stage 5 while answering your questions. You know exactly what you're getting.

attributes.title: The Animated Adventures Panel of Adventure
attributes.caption: Do you like animated adventures? We do too, so join us as we talk about everything RTAA, Achievement Hunter Animated, and Face Jam Animated!
attributes.description: Do you like animated adventures? We do too, so join us as we talk about everything RTAA, Achievement Hunter Animated, and Face Jam Animated! Or, we might just talk about other things, honestly we're just here for a good time.
attributes.display_title: The Animated Adventures Panel of Adventure

attributes.title: From Art to Story: Story Artists in Animation
attributes.caption: Moderated by Rooster Teeth Animation Director, Yssa Badiola, this panel brings together creators and industry professionals to talk about the art and science behind animation
attributes.description: Moderated by Rooster Teeth Animation Director, Yssa Badiola, this panel brings together creators and industry professionals to talk about the art and science behind animation: Elizabeth Ito, creator of “City of Ghosts” on Netflix, Emi Yonemura, Director and Board Artist for Crunchyroll Original series “Onyx Equinox,” Dan Duncan, Supervising Director on “gen:LOCK” premiering Season 2 on HBO Max, Cecilia Aranovich, Supervising Director on Harley Quinn, and Alissa Nutting, Co-creator/Co-showrunner of Teenage Euthanasia on Adult Swim.
attributes.display_title: From Art to Story: Story Artists in Animation

attributes.title: Fun(haus) & Games
attributes.caption: The family is here and ready to feud over all the dumb things.
attributes.description: The family is here and ready to feud over all the dumb things.

attributes.title: Neon Konbini
attributes.caption: The minds behind RT Animation's new anthology series Neon Konbini come together for the first time ever to talk about making the show.
attributes.description: The minds behind RT Animation's new anthology series Neon Konbini come together for the first time ever to talk about making the show. From the re-dubbed anime STAR Bursters to the show about a coffee bean finding his place in the world, the gang dives deep into the creative process and everything in between (literally, they'll talk about making those in-between segments too).

attributes.title: OT3: Observers of Tales, Truths, and Trivia
attributes.caption: Sarah, Ashley, Steffie, and Jarren deep dive into some of your favorite fandom questions and theories.
attributes.description: Sarah, Ashley, Steffie, and Jarren deep dive into some of your favorite fandom questions and theories.
attributes.display_title: OT3: Observers of Tales, Truths, and Trivia

attributes.title: The Ultimate Anime Bracket w/ RDCWorld1
attributes.caption: Tune in as RDCWorld breaks down one of the hardest anime brackets out there and goes over their special event Dream Con happening this month!
attributes.description: Tune in as RDCWorld breaks down one of the hardest anime brackets out there and goes over their special event Dream Con happening this month!
attributes.display_title: The Ultimate Anime Bracket w/ RDCWorld1

attributes.title: Annual Pass
attributes.caption: It's Annual Pass! But Live! We're Answering your questions and showing off some fun images from the past!
attributes.description: It's Annual Pass! But Live! We're Answering your questions and showing off some fun images from the past!

attributes.title: Women in Animation: Storytelling
attributes.caption: Women in Animation (WIA) is a non-profit organization which strives to support and promote female animators. Explore the nuances of narrative with award-winning women writers and directors from live-action and animation.
attributes.description: Women in Animation (WIA) is a non-profit organization which strives to support and promote female animators. Explore the nuances of narrative with award-winning women writers and directors from live-action and animation.

attributes.title: Virtual Cosplay Contest
attributes.caption: Join us as this year’s judges present both cosplay finalists and winners for Best Re-Creation, Best Original Design, Best Workmanship, Best Prop Skills, and the Overall 2021 Winner.
attributes.description: Join us as this year’s judges present both cosplay finalists and winners for Best Re-Creation, Best Original Design, Best Workmanship, Best Prop Skills, and the Overall 2021 Winner.

attributes.title: Let's Play Among Us
attributes.caption: The Achievement Hunter Team hops in one big game of Among Us to see who is the best liar and killer among them.
attributes.description: The Achievement Hunter Team hops in one big game of Among Us to see who is the best liar and killer among them.

attributes.title: RWBY Beyond
attributes.caption: Join us for an exciting, jam-packed panel full of news about upcoming RWBY partnerships and products, including our upcoming video game from WayForward, the next book from Scholastic, new toys/collectibles, and more fun surprises!
attributes.description: Join us for an exciting, jam-packed panel full of news about upcoming RWBY partnerships and products, including our upcoming video game from WayForward, the next book from Scholastic, new toys/collectibles, and more fun surprises! You won't want to miss all the amazing reveals we have in store for fans both new and old!

attributes.title: Camp Betrayal
attributes.caption: Camp Betrayal is Rooster Teeth's newest competition show that forces 9 people to fight for their lives by completing challenges for their evil host The Babadour.
attributes.description: Camp Betrayal is Rooster Teeth's newest competition show that forces 9 people to fight for their lives by completing challenges for their evil host The Babadour. Each episode, contestants are randomly chosen to lie, backstab, and sabotage the group's chance at success, but can they keep their role a secret? Camp Betrayal premieres July 13 on Rooster Teeth! Watch the trailer here: https://roosterteeth.com/watch/camp-betrayal-season-1-trailer

attributes.title: Red vs. Blue: ZERO: Wheels Up
attributes.caption: Join some of the cast and crew of RvB Zero as they discuss the future of the show and give you a sneak peek at what's next!
attributes.description: Join some of the cast and crew of RvB Zero as they discuss the future of the show and give you a sneak peek at what's next!
attributes.display_title: Red vs. Blue: ZERO: Wheels Up

attributes.title: Achievement Hunter Week 2
attributes.caption: Why are you even reading this description? It's the other panel where Achievement Hunter hangs out in Stage 5 while answering your questions. You still know exactly what you're getting.
attributes.description: Why are you even reading this description? It's the other panel where Achievement Hunter hangs out in Stage 5 while answering your questions. You still know exactly what you're getting.

attributes.title: Our Voice, Our Power: Women in Podcasting
attributes.caption: A must-see (and hear!) panel featuring the savvy, intrepid, outspoken, and hilarious women who are making waves in the podcasting world.
attributes.description: A must-see (and hear!) panel featuring the savvy, intrepid, outspoken, and hilarious women who are making waves in the podcasting world. Join Elyse Willems, G4TV’s Riana Manuel, Kinda Funny’s Joey Noelle, Founder of Sense of Wonder Studios and Executive Producer Maria Fernandez, Host/Producer in Esports, Gaming & Entertainment Erin Ashley Simon, This Might Get Weird’s Mamrie Hart and Grace Helbig, and Dead Meat’s Chelsea Rebecca, as they get real about their passions, strategies, and what’s next for this ever-growing industry.
attributes.display_title: Our Voice, Our Power: Women in Podcasting

attributes.title: Funhaus
attributes.caption: Get ready for the Funhaus panel you've all been waiting for! In this action-packed panel-ganza bonanza, there will be twists! turns! surprises! special guests! Jacob Fullerton! special segments! Q&A! audience participation! AND MORE!!!!
attributes.description: Get ready.....for.....the.......Funhaus panel.....you'.....ve......ALLBEEN.......WAIT!.............-ING FOR!!!!! In this action packed panel-ganza bonanza, there will be twists! turns! surprises! special guests! Jacob Fullerton! special segments! Q&A! audience participation! AND MORE!!!!

attributes.title: Cults, Crashes, and Conspiracies
attributes.caption: Murders, mystery, conspiracy and mayhem! Join us for a panel featuring three cults and crimes shows: Red Web, Black Box Down, and iilluminaughtii hosted by Cult Podcast.
attributes.description: Murders, mystery, conspiracy and mayhem! Join us for a panel featuring three cults and crimes shows: Red Web, Black Box Down, and iilluminaughtii hosted by Cult Podcast. Creepy crazy stories, an in-depth look at creating true crime shows, and much more await you in this RTX exclusive.

attributes.title: Better Together: Building A More Inclusive Rooster Teeth
attributes.caption: A diverse group of leaders helping create a more representative Rooster Teeth come together to talk about their experiences, why diversity is important, and their visions for the future.
attributes.description: A diverse group of leaders helping create a more representative Rooster Teeth come together to talk about their experiences, why diversity is important, and their visions for the future.
attributes.display_title: Better Together: Building A More Inclusive Rooster Teeth

attributes.title: A Decade of Death Battle
attributes.caption: IT'S TIME FOR DEATH BATTLE PANEL! Join Wiz and Boomstick as we look back on the past 10 years of DEATH BATTLE, delve deeper with the creators of your favorite match-ups, and get a look at what's to come!
attributes.description: IT'S TIME FOR DEATH BATTLE PANEL! Join Wiz and Boomstick as we look back on the past 10 years of DEATH BATTLE, delve deeper with the creators of your favorite match-ups, and get a look at what's to come!

attributes.title: F**KFACE BREAKS SH*T AT RTX
attributes.caption: Join Geoff, Gavin, and Andrew for a card break live at RTX. Will we finally see the Twin Peaks cards opened? Will Geoff spend hundreds to get a $1 card? Tune in to find out.
attributes.description: Join Geoff, Gavin, and Andrew for a card break live at RTX. Will we finally see the Twin Peaks cards opened? Will Geoff spend hundreds to get a $1 card? Tune in to find out.

attributes.title: Women of Rooster Teeth
attributes.description: Join a few of the amazing Women at Rooster Teeth, representing departments from Achievement Hunter Social, Animation, Funhaus, and the People Team as they take a moment to discuss what it means to be a leader at the company, the various roles they've held, how they've fostered collaboration, and creativity, and their instrumental contributions to Rooster Teeth’s and the entertainment industry’s ongoing successes and changes

attributes.title: Face Jam - Snack Attack
attributes.caption: Our heroes return for a snack attack from RTX at Home. Join Michael Jones and Jordan Cwierz as they do one bite reviews of fan submitted snacks along with producer Eric and Sauce Monkey Nick.
attributes.description: Our heroes return for a snack attack from RTX at Home. Join Michael Jones and Jordan Cwierz as they do one bite reviews of fan submitted snacks along with producer Eric and Sauce Monkey Nick. They eat it so you know if you need it… you probably do.

attributes.title: Representation in Animation
attributes.caption: Our world is a vast and diverse place, so why shouldn’t fictional worlds reflect that? Join some talented folks from Rooster Teeth Animation as they talk about the ins and outs of representation in the animation field and the worlds they create.
attributes.description: Our world is a vast and diverse place, so why shouldn’t the worlds we build in fiction reflect that? Join some of the talented folks from Rooster Teeth Animation as they talk about the in’s and out’s of representation both in the field of animation and in the worlds they create.

attributes.title: Unruly Rollers
attributes.caption: The Unruly Roller crew ventures into space playing Lasers and Feelings. The audience will have an impact on the dangers the team faces. Will they be able to stumble their way out of trouble or are our heroes doomed? Join us to affect the story!
attributes.description: The Unruly Roller crew venture into space playing the tabletop role playing game Lasers and Feelings. The audience will have an impact on the dangers the team face. Will they be able to stumble their way out of trouble or are our heroes doomed? Join us to affect the story!

attributes.title: Behind the Scenes of Red Web
attributes.caption: We take you behind the scenes of Red Web and reveal what goes into the research and editing, look back on our favorite episodes, and discuss what the future of Red Web looks like.
attributes.description:
We take you behind the scenes of Red Web and reveal what goes into the research and editing, look back on our favorite episodes, and discuss what the future of Red Web looks like. This was a panel recorded at Rooster Teeth's RTX at Home.
Red Web is available wherever you listen to podcasts: link.chtbl.com/redweb
attributes.display_title: Behind the Scenes of Red Web

attributes.title: AH Post Team
attributes.caption: Come meet the masters behind the curtain, those who keep Achievement Hunter running behind the scenes.
attributes.description: Come meet the masters behind the curtain, those who keep Achievement Hunter running behind the scenes.

attributes.title: Staying Zen
attributes.caption: Join Kdin and Barbara as they discuss chasing their dreams, what they’ve learned along the way, and the reality behind it all!
attributes.description: The question of “you ever wonder why we’re here?” gets asked a lot around this place, but almost as important is the question of “how did you get here?” Join Kdin and Barbara as they discuss the journey of chasing their dreams, how they got here, what they’ve learned along the way, and the reality behind it all!

attributes.title: Good Morning From Hell @ RT Hexpo Presents: The Future of Hell
attributes.caption: Clayton and Chris present THE FUTURE OF HELL to attendees and Scareholders in this very special live event.
attributes.description: Clayton and Chris present THE FUTURE OF HELL to attendees and Scareholders in this very special live event.
attributes.display_title: Good Morning From Hell @ RT Hexpo Presents: The Future of Hell

attributes.title: G FUEL Presents: The Feast and The Furious Overcooked Tournament
attributes.caption: G FUEL is hosting a contest for the community to compete in the G FUEL Presents: The Feast and the Furious Overcooked Tournament. Selected winners will be paired with a Rooster Teeth personality and compete against others in Overcooked Versus Mode.
attributes.description: G FUEL is hosting a contest for the Rooster Teeth community to enter, and if selected, compete in the G FUEL Presents: The Feast and the Furious Overcooked Tournament. Selected winners will be paired with a Rooster Teeth personality and compete against others in Overcooked Versus Mode. Winners will be paired on a team with either Alfredo Diaz, Lindsay Jones, Chris Demarais, Jon Risinger, Mariel Salcedo, or Kayla Milton.
attributes.display_title: G FUEL Presents: The Feast and The Furious Overcooked Tournament

attributes.title: RTX at Home 2021 - Ten Days of Greatness
attributes.caption: RTX at Home came back bigger and better than ever. We couldn’t have done it without our wonderful community. Thanks for helping us make something special!
attributes.description: RTX at Home came back bigger and better than ever. We couldn’t have done it without our wonderful community. Thanks for helping us make something special!
attributes.display_title: RTX at Home 2021 - Ten Days of Greatness
